channel.title: Arez Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Arez news and events.

item.title: Website Launched
item.description:
This marks the date when the website was launched. The website marks the time when the development on the core features of Arez stabilized enough that documenting the toolkit became viable.
**Features:**
* Basic overview documentation. * [Javadocs]
